title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Situational Interest Strategies for Motivating Online Liberal Arts Education

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic scientific concepts and specialized field background knowledge
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more connections between liberal science topics and their professional fields (medical/legal/technical).
Learners can apply two or more motivation strategies in online learning environments through case analysis by situation.
Learners can perform peer evaluations using science content created with creative writing techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
